items.title: Fun Character Unlocking
items.description: Unlock new characters by achieving high scores in Multiplayer Mode.

items.title: Multiple Game Modes
items.description: Choose between Multiplayer Mode or Time Trial for diverse gameplay experiences.

items.title: Simple Controls
items.description: Easily control your character with keyboard or gamepad for smooth gameplay.

items.text: Navigate through the house to complete simple tasks while avoiding various hazards.
Use the keyboard or gamepad controls to move, jump, and interact.
Watch out for obstacles like the robot vacuum and flying objects!
Compete against other players to complete tasks first while sabotaging them.
Spin the lucky wheel after each round to determine your fate!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subTitle: Common questions about House of Hazards

items.question: How do you unlock characters in House of Hazards?
items.answer: You unlock new characters by winning games in Multiplayer Mode.

items.question: Is House of Hazards an online game?
items.answer: No, it's a local multiplayer game for 2-4 players.

items.question: What types of hazards are present in the game?
items.answer: Expect hazards like falling lights, misfiring taps, and flying toast!

items.question: Can I play with a gamepad?
items.answer: Yes, you can use a gamepad for players 3 and 4.

items.question: What are the available game modes?
items.answer: You can choose between Multiplayer Mode and Time Trial.
